code: import*as actionTypes from"./actionTypes";export var selectTemplate=function selectTemplate(id){return{type:actionTypes.SELECTTEMPLATE,payload:id};};export var selectResume=function selectResume(id){return{type:actionTypes.SELECTRESUME,payload:id};};export var addPersonalInfo=function addPersonalInfo(details){return{type:actionTypes.ADDPERSONALINFO,payload:details};};export var addExperience=function addExperience(experience){return{type:actionTypes.ADDEXPERIENCE,payload:experience};};export var addAllExperience=function addAllExperience(experiences){return{type:actionTypes.ADDALLEXPERIENCE,payload:experiences};};export var addNewSkills=function addNewSkills(){return{type:actionTypes.ADDNEWSKILLS,payload:null};};export var editSkill=function editSkill(skills){return{type:actionTypes.EDITSKILL,payload:skills};};export var deleteSkill=function deleteSkill(id){return{type:actionTypes.DELETESKILL,payload:id};};export var addEducation=function addEducation(details){return{type:actionTypes.ADDEDUCATION,payload:details};};
